title: Silicon Bayou Gala
content: Had an amazing time in the Silicon Bayou Gala. Thanks for the event Louisiana State University and LSU Division of Computer Science & Engineering.
office: 2329 Patrick F Taylor Building, Baton Rouge, LA 70803

title: Happy Saturday at Mehrasa's + CHI LBW Paper Celebration
content: We had a lovely Saturday night at Mehrasa's place—thank you for the amazing food and warm hospitality! It was also a perfect time to celebrate great news: Mehrasa, Vimal, and Nushrat's papers have been accepted for publication in the Extended Abstracts of the 2025 Conference on Human Factors in Computing Systems. Cheers to your hard work and well-deserved success!
office: 2329 Patrick F Taylor Building, Baton Rouge, LA 70803

title: Welcome, Mehrasa! + Paper Submission Celebration
content: In February, we warmly welcomed our newest CHIVE member, Mehrasa, to the team! To make the occasion even better, we also celebrated the submission of four papers—what a milestone! We marked the moment with a delicious dinner at Sushi Masa. Here's to new beginnings and hard work paying off!
office: 2329 Patrick F Taylor Building, Baton Rouge, LA 70803

title: Thanksgiving BBQ
content: We celebrated Thanksgiving 2024 with a fun BBQ at Vyri's place! Instead of the usual indoor dinner, we took it outside and grilled a whole turkey together. It was a great way to enjoy this traditional American holiday with good food and even better company.
office: 2329 Patrick F Taylor Building, Baton Rouge, LA 70803

title: End of Spring 2024 Semester Dinner at Sushi Masa
content: To wrap up the Spring 2024 semester, the CHIVE team got together for a well-deserved dinner at Sushi Masa! Great food, lots of laughs, and a nice way to celebrate the end of a busy semester.
office: 2329 Patrick F Taylor Building, Baton Rouge, LA 70803
